CustomField.formula: Product2.CWS_NetSuite_Internal_Id__c & '-' & TEXT(Product2.CWS_Source__c) & '-' & TEXT( CurrencyIsoCode )& '-' & LEFT(TEXT( SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__Quote__r.CWS_Route_to_Market__c),1) & '-' & LEFT(TEXT(CWS_Billing_Term__c ),1) & '-' & TEXT (SBQQ__QuoteLine__r.SBQQ__DiscountTier__r.SBQQ__Number__c)
CustomField.label: Vendor Part #
